title: Telegram scam or honesty?
text:

It‚Äôs seemed that telegram in the safe nest of fraudulent and scammers, just be cautious and do not care and trust any offer in the channels you do not know properly, ever never trust.

title: Does not transfer blocked contacts
text: Blocked contacts *do not* transfer when you set up an account with Telegram. Even when you manually block said contacts, their profile and activity are still visible to you. This is not acceptable nor safe for some. In my case was for my safety against a very unsafe stalker I had blocked for over 2 years and they just reached access to me in this moment. Unacceptable. This needs to be fixed for the global collective‚Äôs safety and mental health well being.  Unreal.
